column4: hi all...i'm trying to use this thread to install drivers for my texas 5-in-1 card reader>> http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=3726886#post3726886 << but everytime i try to 'make' it installs into my "make -C /lib/modules/2.6.24-19-generic/build M=/home/" old kernel... i'm now using 24-21... how do i make it install into the new kernel?
